title: example
text: this is an example of the note

title: Way to add notes
text: when you click the right top + button you can add notes to the server

title: Save
text: when you press the save button it saves the notes for you with the special id combined with numbers and the alphabet

title: Clicking the notes
text: When you click the notes, it shows the text of the notes with the title on this right side of the page

title: Delete
text:
You can also delete the message by clicking the trashcan button on the right side of the each note 
it automatically finds the id of the notes and deletes from the db.json file
